state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, go to the south. After that, take a trip west. After that, look and see that the type U portal within the playroom is unlocked with the type U passkey. After that, ensure that the type U portal is open. And then, attempt to go to the west. With that accomplished, make an effort to head west. And then, make an attempt to go to the south. Following that, move south. With that accomplished, travel east. If you can get around to doing that, travel east. Then, pick-up the blanket from the floor of the salon. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Shower =- You are in a shower.
